name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kyruus Health (formerly Epion Health) Admin Toolkit

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Kyruus Health (formerly Epion Health) Admin Toolkit extension enables staff to assist patients in completing Check-In steps…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Kyruus Health (formerly Epion Health) Admin Toolkit extension enables staff to assist patients in completing Check-In steps without leaving the athenahealth EHR interface. Admin Toolkit gives staff the ability to easily send the following:
- PreVisit forms and information
- Payment requests
- Clinical, administrative, and encounter documents “on the fly” before, during, or after a visit
- Personalized text messages
